posts.title: scAvenger Hunt
posts.text: Tony Stark in a drunken stupor hid the credentials for the system somewhere on this website. Can you look help jarvis in retrieving them? Sometimes what you want it is right infront of you. All you have to do is open your eyes and see it. Can you see Dave_flag[blabla] ? :P Don’t tell this to anyone but the flag name starts with Dave_flag Paying attention to small details makes all the difference.Goodluck ~~~ One of these will help you in your quest for glory!!! Million Dollar Question - which one?Is it this one…..1Grep can be an extremely powerful weapon if you know how to wield the sword. More info: Grep or this one…..1Inspect the source code of this webpage. More info: Inspect Element
